dialogueTree.title: Mail Collection Box: "The dented yellow mailbox greets yo..."
dialogueTree.text: The dented yellow mailbox greets you with it's graffito, bullet holes and an RCM sticker.

dialogueTree.title: Mail Collection Box: "The dented yellow mailbox greets yo..."
dialogueTree.text: The dented yellow mailbox greets you with it's graffito and bullet holes in the front.

dialogueTree.title: Mail Collection Box: "This "Poste L'Aventurier" mail coll..."
dialogueTree.text: This "Poste L'Aventurier" mail collection box has been heavily vandalized with graffito. A closer inspection reveals two bullet holes in the front.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "A faint sticker on the side reads:..."
links.text: A faint sticker on the side reads: "RCM Emergencies Desk no 8-100-2", with a slogan: "Mankind, be vigilant!"

links.title: You: ""I knew we'd get to use this mailbo..."
links.text: "I knew we'd get to use this mailbox -- for something."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Other than kicking?""
links.text: "Other than kicking?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. For sending mail.""
links.text: "Yes. For sending mail."

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "Other than kicking? You were right!"
links.text: Other than kicking? You were right!

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "Other than developing a personal re..."
links.text: Other than developing a personal relationship? Looks like you were right.

links.title: You: "Drop the white envelope into the ma..."
links.text: Drop the white envelope into the mailbox.

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "You drop the white envelope in the..."
links.text: You drop the white envelope in the darkness. It lands with a soft thud on what sounds like a couple of letters.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "About a week's worth of mail has co..."
links.text: About a week's worth of mail has collected in there. They'll empty this very soon.

links.title: Logic: "Probably did the right thing. You c..."
links.text: Probably did the right thing. You can't trust that slug Evrart -- you *know* he's going to play you somehow.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go back to Evrart." The lieu..."
links.text: "Let's go back to Evrart." The lieutenant turns towards the industrial harbour. "This better be worth it -- after what we did."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright, let's go back to Evrart."..."
links.text: "Alright, let's go back to Evrart." The lieutenant turns towards the industrial harbour. "If we don't mention anything to him, he won't know before it's too late."

links.title: Inland Empire: "For good or ill, the deed is done."
links.text: For good or ill, the deed is done.

links.title: You: "Drop the white envelope into the ma..."
links.text: Drop the white envelope into the mailbox.

links.title: You: "Drop the white envelope into the ma..."
links.text: Drop the white envelope into the mailbox.

links.title: You: "Drop the white envelope into the ma..."
links.text: Drop the white envelope into the mailbox.

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "But the documents inside the envelo..."
links.text: But the documents inside the envelope still lack the required signatures...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not going to be that easy. We..."
links.text: "It's not going to be that easy. We need to dirty our hands with the signatures." He looks around. "I assume that's the goal here."

links.title: Logic: "It's not going to be that easy. Evr..."
links.text: It's not going to be that easy. Evrart wants you to dirty your hands getting these signatures and he will quickly find out if you just mail.

links.title: You: ""Good mail delivery box." (Pat the..."
links.text: "Good mail delivery box." (Pat the box.)

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "The mail collection box has no fait..."
links.text: The mail collection box has no faith in your psychopathic manipulations.

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "The box seems happy."
links.text: The box seems happy.

links.title: Perception (Sight): ""Eat shit, pig!", "FUCKED BY THE CU..."
links.text: "Eat shit, pig!", "FUCKED BY THE CUNN" and "Saint-G" with a crown have been scribbled on it. "Jennie is a WHORE" and "*Baise cette* mailbox!" also.

links.title: You: "I feel you, mail collection box."
links.text: I feel you, mail collection box.

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "The mail collection box seems catha..."
links.text: The mail collection box seems cathartic, thankful even. So do you. You shudder. Then you swallow.

links.title: Shivers: "And then suddenly you see it: over..."
links.text: And then suddenly you see it: over all the other graffitos someone has -- using the tip of a very sharp knife -- cut the words: REVACHOL FOREVER.

links.title: You: "Been there, *Poste L'Aventurier* ma..."
links.text: Been there, *Poste L'Aventurier* mail collection box... been there.

links.title: You: "Mail collection box, you should man..."
links.text: Mail collection box, you should man the fuck up.

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "The mailbox does not know how to ma..."
links.text: The mailbox does not know how to man up, it is an inanimate object.

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "The mail collection box has no fait..."
links.text: The mail collection box has no faith in your psychopathic manipulations.

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "The box seems happy."
links.text: The box seems happy.

links.title: You: ""Fuck you, mail delivery box!" (Kic..."
links.text: "Fuck you, mail delivery box!" (Kick it.)

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "There is a hollow ring as you kick..."
links.text: There is a hollow ring as you kick the box. It sounds like it's mostly empty. Your toe hurts now.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Your toe has suffered damage. It hu..."
links.text: Your toe has suffered damage. It hurts!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Cool." The lieutenant nods approvi..."
links.text: "Cool." The lieutenant nods approvingly. "You really showed that mail collection box."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He does not actually think it's coo..."
links.text: He does not actually think it's cool. If anything, the lieutenant feels sorry for the poor box -- he's leaning in to inspect the layers of graffito that deface it.

links.title: You: ""Oh, you're being sarcastic. I get..."
links.text: "Oh, you're being sarcastic. I get it. It was actually a dick move."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant pats the box, ever s..."
links.text: The lieutenant pats the box, ever so slightly.

links.title: Empathy: "Dodged the bullet there... He must..."
links.text: Dodged the bullet there... He must see the box as the weaker of the two, and you as a bully -- something he doesn't stand for.

links.title: You: "(Rub your toe.) "You think so? You..."
links.text: (Rub your toe.) "You think so? You think it was cool?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't. Let's go.""
links.text: "I don't. Let's go."

links.title: Empathy: "He must see the box as the weaker o..."
links.text: He must see the box as the weaker of the two, and you as a bully -- something he doesn't stand for.

links.title: You: "Say nothing. [Leave.]"
links.text: Say nothing. [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant pats the box on the..."
links.text: The lieutenant pats the box on the head, ever so slightly, before walking away.

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "There is a hollow, saddened ring as..."
links.text: There is a hollow, saddened ring as you kick the L'Aventurier mail collection box. It sounds betrayed, in disbelief even.

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "There is a hollow ring as you kick..."
links.text: There is a hollow ring as you kick the box. It sounds like it's mostly empty. Your toe hurts now.

links.title: Mail Collection Box: "There is a hollow, saddened ring as..."
links.text: There is a hollow, saddened ring as you kick the L'Aventurier mail collection box. It sounds betrayed, in disbelief even.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
